bibl.title: The Reuse of the Temple of Isis at Aswan as a Church in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: Paper presented in the First Annual Symposium of Coptic Studies held on 29 March 2008 at the University of Toronto. - Introduction. - The temple of Isis at Aswan. - The graffiti. - The pavement. - The altars. - The niches. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes

bibl.seg: Dijkstra Jitse, The Reuse of the Temple of Isis at Aswan as a Church in Late Antiquity.

Paper presented in the First Annual Symposium of Coptic Studies held on 29 March 2008 at the University of Toronto. - Introduction. - The temple of Isis at Aswan. - The graffiti. - The pavement. - The altars. - The niches. - Conclusion.
